subSubSection.paragraph: Gymnobothrus longicornis sellatus (Uvarov, 1953), stat. n. et comb. n. Figs 193-196
-ANGOLA: Moxico dist. rivers Lumeje; Munhango, Lungue Bungu, Mu-Simoj; Bihe dist. Cohemba. Also, Tundavala; Bruco; 15 mi. N. Sa de Bandeira; River Langiliko.
-The specimens from Bruco are less sellate and coriaceous and more like those from Tanzania.
-ANGOLA. Adults recorded in VI, VIII, IX, X.
